snippet.title: Slice and Bite - Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Slice and Bite is an action platformer pixel art game where you play as Cosimo, a pizza delivering vampire living in a demon infested medieval Italy. 

Choose your delivery routes and upgrade your magical carriage. Save your family pizzeria from certain doom by slicing your way through levels, defeating challenging bosses, uncovering secrets and exploring the cartoony world of the Dark Dark Ages.

You can Wishlist this game now on Steam! : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2366210/Slice_and_Bite/

Or try out the demo from Itch.io :
https://tinymoldgames.itch.io/slice-and-bite
